mineBlock.title: Welcome to POW!
mineBlock.description: You’re now the operator of your very own blockchain. Your mission? Mine blocks to grow your chain, earn rewards, and unlock new powers. Start clicking to mine your first block!

purchaseTransactions.title: Unlock a Transaction
purchaseTransactions.description: “Nice work!” Click the transaction to unlock it — that’s how you include it in a block. Transactions fuel your blockchain… and your profits!

addTransactionsToBlock.title: Transactions ready!
addTransactionsToBlock.description: Now load up your block! You can only mine a block once it’s full — so add transactions until it’s packed and ready. Then hit mine to seal it and earn your reward!

checkStore.title: Visit the Shop
checkStore.description: Now let’s put those coins to use. Head to the Shop to unlock new transaction types, activate automation, and buy powerful upgrades. Every purchase boosts your blockchain!

purchaseFeeUpgrade.title: Purchase Fee Upgrade
purchaseFeeUpgrade.description: Now click on the fee upgrade to increase your fee per transaction.

purchaseSpeedUpgrade.title: Transactions automatically added to block
purchaseSpeedUpgrade.description: Now click on the speed upgrade to add transactions to the block fasterr.

L2Upgrade.title: Congrats! You now have an L2
L2Upgrade.description: Click here to manage the L2.

dataAvailability.title: Congrats! You now have a data availability layer
dataAvailability.description: Click here to manage the data availability layer.

prover.title: Congrats! You now have a prover
prover.description: Click here to manage the prover.
